mapper.select: select seq, business_code, bizcd, subject, instt_section, product_section, price, discount, sale_qy, content, writer_id, writer_name, consent, consent_date, request, delete_at, register_date, update_date, instt_name, (select biznm from tb_company c where c.bizcd = e.bizcd) as biznm from tb_saleplan e where delete_at = 0 and bizcd = #{bizcd} order by register_date desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
select nvl(max(seq), 0) +1 as seq from tb_saleplan ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY
mapper.update: update tb_saleplan set delete_at = 1 where seq = #{seq}
